short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful Chrome extension that enhances the Fooocus web UI experience by adding useful features and improvements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fooocus Enhancer Chrome Extension 

Overview:
Fooocus Enhancer Chrome Extension is a feature-rich tool designed to improve the usability and functionality of the Fooocus web UI. By adding critical enhancements like trigger word management and future integrations with CivitAI, this extension simplifies workflows for LoRA model enthusiasts. Initially created for personal use, the project has evolved to incorporate a broader vision of functionality and accessibility.

Features:
- Trigger Word Management: Save, edit, and paste trigger words from downloaded LoRA models directly into the positive prompt.
- User-Friendly Interface: Enhancements to simplify the interaction with the Fooocus UI.
- Scalability: Designed with a roadmap for adding advanced features and integrations.

Roadmap:
Implemented Features
‚úÖ Trigger Word Management: Save, edit, and reuse trigger words seamlessly.
Planned Features.

üü¶ VueJS Integration: Migrate to VueJS for better template and state management.
üü¶ Export Settings: Add options to export user settings for portability.
üü¶ CivitAI Integration: Enable browsing CivitAI profiles directly from the extension.
üü¶ Model Downloads: Allow downloading models directly from CivitAI within the extension.
üü¶ Code Refactoring: Optimize and clean up the existing codebase for maintainability.

Known Issues:
‚ö†Ô∏è The default container for basic LoRA trigger words does not display during the initial load.
‚ö†Ô∏è Trigger word containers are not shown by default when selecting presets; users must reselect manually.

Contribution:
This project is open to contributions! If you have ideas for features or find bugs, feel free to create a pull request or open an issue on GitHub.
